sect1.title: Complete list of configure options

note.para: These are only used at compile time. If you want to alter PHP's runtime configuration, please see the chapter on Configuration.

sect1.para: The following is a complete list of options supported by PHP 4 configure scripts (as of 4.1.0), used when compiling in Unix-like environments. Some are available in PHP 3, some in PHP 4, and some in both. This is not noted yet.
There are general configuration options for the configure script, consult the appropriate manual pages for GNU autoconf or use the command configure --help for a full, up-to-date list.
